student_onboarding.title: Student Onboarding Script

steps.name: Awareness
steps.script: Hi! We're Elevate for Humanity. You may qualify for FREE credentialed training in programs like CNA, Barber Apprenticeship, HVAC, and Building Tech. All programs lead to real certifications and job placement support. Are you interested in starting today?

steps.name: Enrollment
steps.script: Great! You can enroll online at https://elevateconnectsdirectory.org. Just select your program and click 'Enroll Now.' The application usually takes about 3‚Äì5 minutes.

steps.name: Account Creation
steps.script: When you create your account, use your phone number or email. As soon as you're done, you'll get access to your Student Dashboard.

steps.name: Orientation
steps.script: Before classes begin, please complete the short online orientation inside your dashboard. It explains your program, expectations, and what support you have.

steps.name: ID Verification
steps.script: We'll need a picture of your ID and a selfie for verification. You can upload both directly from your phone or computer inside the dashboard.

steps.name: Program Assignment
steps.script: After we review your application and verify your information, you'll be assigned to a training provider. Your dashboard will update with class dates, location (if in-person), or virtual access details.

steps.name: Training Start
steps.script: You'll receive reminders and updates inside your dashboard. You can track your progress, see upcoming sessions, and message support if you need help.

steps.name: Certification
steps.script: When you finish all requirements, Elevate will issue your state-recognized certificate. You'll receive a serial number that can be verified publicly.

steps.name: Job Placement
steps.script: After you're certified, we help connect you with employers, apprenticeships, and workforce partners. Our goal is to support you from training into actual employment.

student_onboarding.supportLine: Anytime you need help, call or text us at 317-314-3757.

steps.name: Outreach
steps.script: Hi, this is Elevate for Humanity. We're building a statewide network of credentialed training partners, and we'd love to explore adding your program as an official provider. We work with schools, barbershops, training centers, and employers who want to offer approved training and get student referrals.

steps.name: Application
steps.script: You can apply to become a partner here: https://elevateconnectsdirectory.org/program-holder/apply. We'll review your license, training outline, and capacity.

steps.name: Approval
steps.script: Once you're approved, we'll give you access to a Partner Dashboard. There, you'll see students assigned to your programs, manage their progress, and submit completions.

steps.name: Delegates
steps.script: You can add instructors, admin staff, and delegates. Each person will receive their own secure login so they can manage their part of the pipeline.

steps.name: Student Flow
steps.script: Students who select your program will appear in your dashboard with their details. You'll review them, finalize onboarding, and update their status as they move through training.

steps.name: Completion
steps.script: When a student finishes, you simply mark them as 'Completed' in your dashboard. Elevate will handle issuing the certificate and updating the public verification tool.

steps.name: Compliance
steps.script: We'll periodically review your logs, attendance, and documentation to keep everything aligned with state, workforce, and credentialing standards.

steps.name: Initial Outreach
steps.script: Hi! This is Elevate for Humanity. We connect employers with credentialed talent in CNA, HVAC, Barbering, Building Tech, and related workforce roles. Would you like to partner with us for direct candidate referrals or potential OJT/WEX (On-the-Job Training) opportunities?

steps.name: Agreement
steps.script: We'll send a simple employer agreement outlining roles, expectations, and how referrals work. Once it's signed, we'll add you to our employer list and begin sending candidates that fit your needs.

steps.name: Referral Flow
steps.script: You tell us the roles, schedule, and requirements you're hiring for. We match you with students who have completed their training and are ready to work.

steps.name: Wage Reimbursement
steps.script: If you're eligible, we'll help you connect with workforce partners to explore wage reimbursement or On-the-Job Training funds. This can lower your cost of hiring while supporting our learners.

steps.name: Follow-Up
steps.script: We'll check in with you and the candidate after hiring to see how things are going, help with any concerns, and keep improving the pipeline.

tasks.description: Go to https://elevateconnectsdirectory.org/admin/dashboard and log in using your admin credentials.
Go to the 'Students' section. Filter for 'New' or 'Pending' applications. Confirm ID, eligibility, and program selection. Assign the student to a training provider.
Check each program or partner for active students. Review attendance, milestones, and any flags or notes. Send reminders or messages as needed.
Navigate to 'Certificates' > 'Issue Certificate.' Select the student and the program they completed. Enter completion date and confirm. The system generates a certificate and a unique serial number.
Anyone can verify a certificate at https://elevateconnectsdirectory.org/cert/verify/[serial]. Just enter the serial number on the certificate.

Use the 'Reports' section to see completion rates, partner performance, active vs. inactive students, and program-level data. Export reports weekly or monthly for grants, workforce partners, and internal review.

scripts.script: Hi, thank you for calling Elevate for Humanity, this is [Name]. How can I help you today?
Perfect! Enrollment is free for qualifying students, and it only takes a few minutes. You can start at https://elevateconnectsdirectory.org. If you'd like, I can text or email you the link right now.
Yes. We work with state and workforce partners so that qualifying students do not pay out of pocket for tuition. Our goal is to remove barriers so you can focus on training and getting certified.
We offer multiple pathways: CNA, Barber Apprenticeship, HVAC, Building Tech, Peer Recovery and other workforce programs. I can help you choose based on your interests, schedule, and goals.

templates.name: Initial Outreach
templates.message: Hi! This is Elevate for Humanity. You may qualify for FREE credentialed training (CNA, Barber, HVAC, Building Tech & more). Start here: https://elevateconnectsdirectory.org Reply YES if you want help.

templates.name: YES Response
templates.message: Awesome! What program are you most interested in: CNA, Barber, HVAC, Building Tech, or not sure yet?

templates.name: Post-Enrollment
templates.message: Great job! Your application is submitted. Log in to your Student Dashboard for updates: https://elevateconnectsdirectory.org/lms/dashboard Text SUPPORT if you need help.

templates.name: Acceptance Email
templates.subject: You're In! Your Elevate Training Is Ready üéâ
templates.body:
Hello [First Name],

Welcome to Elevate for Humanity!

Your application has been approved, and your training pathway is ready.

You can log into your Student Dashboard anytime here:
https://elevateconnectsdirectory.org/lms/dashboard

Next Steps:
1. Complete your online orientation.
2. Upload your ID for verification.
3. Watch for your training provider assignment.
4. Begin classes and track your progress in your dashboard.

We're here to support you from enrollment to employment.

If you have any questions, call or text us at 317-314-3757.

With gratitude,
Elevate for Humanity
https://elevateconnectsdirectory.org

cna.name: CNA (Certified Nursing Assistant)
cna.pitch: Our CNA program prepares you to provide hands-on care in hospitals, long-term care, and home health settings. It's fully credentialed, designed to meet employer expectations, and leads directly to in-demand jobs.

barber.name: Barber Apprenticeship
barber.pitch: We are one of only a few approved barber apprenticeship sponsors in the state. You train in real barbershops, learn from working barbers, and work your way toward your license while building a client base.

hvac.name: HVAC Technician
hvac.pitch: Our HVAC pathway gives you the fundamentals to start working with heating, ventilation, and air conditioning systems. This is a high-demand, high-pay field with strong long-term career growth.

building_tech.name: Building Tech
building_tech.pitch: Building Tech prepares you for building maintenance, facilities operations, and related roles. It's ideal for people who like hands-on work, problem-solving, and keeping buildings running smoothly.

sequences.name: 24-Hour Follow-Up
sequences.message: Hi [Name], this is Elevate for Humanity. We saw you started an application yesterday. Do you have any questions? We're here to help! Call or text: 317-314-3757

sequences.name: 7-Day Follow-Up
sequences.message: Hi [Name], just checking in! Your Elevate application is still open. Need help finishing it? We can walk you through it. Call/text: 317-314-3757 or visit: https://elevateconnectsdirectory.org

sequences.name: Post-Enrollment Check-In
sequences.message: Hi [Name]! Congrats on enrolling with Elevate! Have you completed your orientation yet? Let us know if you need any help. Text SUPPORT or call 317-314-3757.

voicemail.title: Voicemail Script
voicemail.script: Hi, you've reached Elevate for Humanity. We're here to help you access FREE credentialed training in CNA, Barber Apprenticeship, HVAC, Building Tech, and more. Please leave your name, phone number, and which program you're interested in, and we'll call you back within 24 hours. Or visit us online at elevateconnectsdirectory.org to enroll now. Thank you!
